title: Peel Garlic Fast
short: Put garlic cloves in a jar and shake for 20–30s — skins pop right off.

title: Keep Avocado Fresh
short: Store with an onion slice or a squeeze of lemon; wrap tightly to slow browning.

title: Freeze Coffee Cubes
short: Pour leftover coffee into ice trays to keep iced coffee from diluting.

title: Soft Cookies Trick
short: Place a slice of bread in the cookie container to keep cookies soft.

title: Microwave Lemon for Juicing
short: Microwave lemons 10s before juicing for more juice and easier squeezing.

title: Perfect Pancake Pour
short: Use a squeeze bottle/ketchup bottle for perfectly round pancake batter.

title: Restore Stale Bread
short: Sprinkle water and heat briefly in oven to refresh stale bread.

title: Quick Egg Peel
short: Crack and roll egg on counter then peel under running water for easier removal.

title: No-Tear Onions
short: Chill onions in fridge before chopping to reduce tears.

title: Crispy Reheat Pizza
short: Reheat pizza in a skillet with a lid for crispy bottom and melty top.

title: Prevent Pasta Water Boil-Over
short: Place a wooden spoon across pot to stop boil-over.

title: Freeze Herbs
short: Freeze herbs in olive oil in ice cube trays to preserve for cooking.

title: Ripen Bananas Fast
short: Place bananas in a paper bag with an apple to speed ripening.

title: Keep Greens Crisp
short: Store greens with a paper towel to absorb moisture and stay crisp.

title: Peel Tomatoes Easily
short: Score and blanch tomatoes for 30s, then peel skins off quickly.

title: Stop Avocado Browning
short: Brush avocado with lemon or lime juice to slow oxidation.

title: Quick Chill Drinks
short: Wrap a wet paper towel around a bottle and place in freezer for 15 minutes.

title: Seed Pump from Bell Pepper
short: Cut top and push seeds out with a finger for a clean pepper core.

title: Grate Butter for Baking
short: Grate cold butter to blend faster into flour for flaky pastry.

title: Juice More Lemon
short: Roll lemon firmly under palm to soften and make juicing easier.

title: Open Jar Easily
short: Tap edge of lid with spoon and run under hot water to loosen stubborn lids.

title: Toast Nuts Fast
short: Toast nuts in a dry skillet over medium heat for added flavor.

title: Keep Brown Sugar Soft
short: Store with a marshmallow or slice of bread to prevent hardening.

title: Freshen Rice
short: Reheat leftover rice with a splash of water covered to steam and restore texture.

title: Remove Stubborn Eggshell
short: Use a larger shell piece to scoop out smaller shell fragments easily.

title: Use Citrus Peels
short: Freeze citrus peels and use for zest or infusing drinks.

title: Quick Marinade
short: Use yogurt or buttermilk as a quick tenderizing marinade for meats.

title: Peel Ginger with Spoon
short: Use the edge of a spoon to easily scrape off ginger skin.

title: Chill Wine Fast
short: Wrap wine bottle in damp towel and place in freezer 10–15 minutes.

title: Keep Apples from Browning
short: Brush apple slices with lemon juice or saltwater briefly.

title: Prevent Boil-Over with Oil
short: Add a few drops of oil to boiling water to reduce bubbling.
